typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Value as decimal(28,2) '000,000,000.000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PaymentsAzDL
source(output(
		CustomerName as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		PaymentDate as string,
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> PaymentsCosmosDB
PaymentsAzDL sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PaymentNr,
		SalesOrderNr,
		CustomerNr,
		CustomerName,
		PaymentDate,
		PaymentValue = Value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapePayments

source.query:
select {[Measures].[0D_NW_NETV], [Measures].[0D_NW_OORV]} on columns,
   [0D_NW_CNTRY].[LEVEL01] on rows
from [$0D_NW_C01]

properties.description: Copy incremental data from SAP BW Open Hub table to ADLS Gen2

activities.name: LookupLastRequestId
activities.description: Retrieve the last max copied request ID stored in blob

activities.name: CopyFromSAPBWOpenHub
activities.description: Copy incremental data from SAP BW Open Hub table to ADLS Gen2

activities.name: SetMaxCopiedRequestId
activities.description: Store the latest max copied request ID into blob by calling Logic App

activities.name: CopyFromSAPTable
activities.description: Copy incremental data from SAP table to AzureBlobStorage

activities.name: LookupLastCopiedDate
activities.description: Copy incremental data from SAP table to AzureBlobStorage

activities.name: SetLastCopiedDate
activities.description: Store the last copied date into blob by calling Logic App
